servinfo.title: Inspection of TCM and Its Circuits
servinfo.ptxt: TCM and its circuits can be checked at TCM wiring connectors by measuring voltage, pulse signal and resistance.

attention2.ptxt: TCM cannot be checked by itself, it is strictly prohibited to connect voltmeter or ohmmeter to TCM with connector disconnected from it.

s1.ptxt: Remove TCM (1) from vehicle referring to Transmission Control Module (TCM) Removal and Installation:5 A/T .
Check voltage and/or pulse signal at each terminal of connectors connected using voltmeter (3) and oscilloscope (4).

item.ptxt: As each terminal voltage is affected by battery voltage, confirm that it is 11 V or more when ignition switch is ON.
Voltage with asterisk (*) cannot be measured by voltmeter because it is pulse signal. Check it with oscilloscope if necessary.

figure.title: Terminal arrangement of TCM connector (Viewed from harness side)

entry.ptxt: (Output signal is duty pulse. Duty ratio varies depending on throttle valve opening.)
(Output signal is duty pulse. Duty ratio varies depending on torque converter clutch opening condition.)
Engine running at specified idling speed.
(CAN communication signal is pulse. Pulse signal frequency varies depending on engine condition.)

Ignition switch ON, fluid temperature is 100 °C (212 °F)
Ignition switch ON, select lever in “P” range
Ignition switch ON, select lever in “P” range
Engine running at specified idling speed.
(CAN communication signal is pulse. Pulse signal frequency varies depending on engine condition.)

Ignition switch ON, selector lever at other than “R” range
Ignition switch ON, transfer position in 4H
Ignition switch OFF, transfer position in 4L and N
Ignition switch turned ON, engine stops.
(Output signal is waveform. Waveform frequency varies depending on output shaft speed. (18 pulses are generated par 1 input shaft revolution.))
Ignition switch turned ON, engine stops.
(Output signal is waveform. Waveform frequency varies depending on input shaft speed. (24 pulses are generated par 1 input shaft revolution.))
